meta_description: Visit the newly renovated Frick Collection, your home for art from the Renaissance through the late nineteenth century. Advance timed tickets are required! Members visit free, with no reservations.
hours_text:
The museum will open at 11:00 a.m. on Sunday, February 11, after Member Morning. Not a member? [Join now to attend](https://tickets.frick.org/membership/330/join)! 

Now Open 

## 

The Frick Collection

1 East 70th Street

Timed tickets required (except for members)

We appreciate your ticket purchase, which helps us continue to share our collections and programs!

accessibility_text:
# 

Accessibility

The Frick Collection welcomes all visitors and encourages them to utilize our available resources. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment and ensuring visitors with disabilities can enjoy the Collection.

For questions or suggestions, please contact us at [accessibility@frick.org](mailto:accessibility@frick.org).

* * *

[**Admission**](/visit/accessibility#admission)

[**Transportation**](/visit/accessibility#transportation)

[**Visiting**](/visit/accessibility#visit)

[**Security Procedures**](/visit/accessibility#security)

[**Programs**](/visit/accessibility#programs)

[**Website**](/visit/accessibility#website)

* * *

## ADMISSION

Discounted admission is offered for people with disabilities, and free admission is extended to a care partner.

When purchasing a ticket, choose "Visitor with disability." Care partners will receive a free ticket at the Admissions Desk upon entry to the museum.

Ticket questions?  
Email: [accessibility@frick.org](mailto:accessibility@frick.org)

[Tickets](/tickets)

* * *

## TRANSPORTATION

[Visit Map](/visit#directions)

### **By Subway**

Closest station: 6 train at 68th Street and Lexington Avenue

Most convenient ADA-accessible stations:

  * 6 train at 68th Street and Lexington Avenue
  * Q train at 72nd Street and Second Avenue

Check the subway station’s [Elevator & Escalator Status](https://new.mta.info/elevator-escalator-status) on the day of your visit.

### **By Bus**

  * Northbound M1, M2, M3...
collections_text:
The Frick Collection's historic buildings are closed for renovation. [Explore online](/explore)!

Last chance! Double your impact through December 31. [Donate today](/annual_fund)

The Frick Collection is back! Get closer to more of our masterpieces than ever before in our newly renovated home. Visit today!
